title: AI & ML Integration in Web Design

sections.heading: Introduction to AI & ML
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) are transforming web design by enabling personalized user experiences and advanced data analysis.

sections.heading: Applications
content: 1. **Personalization**: Tailoring content based on user behavior.

sections.heading: Getting Started
content: Leverage AI and ML libraries and platforms like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and AWS AI services. Start with small projects and scale as you learn.
